Articles.Content:
Hi everyone.

I have been trying up update KSP mods after this latest update so I can continue my KSP Friday youtube series. As usual I took a few weeks break from KSP to let the mods update after the new version of KSP came out. Problem is I cant find all the mods I was using and I am worried about breaking things.

I cant find.

TTmodularwheels

Something listed in my mods folder simply as VFM.

Need an updated version of BACE 0.19 v.1.2

I also cannot find the mod for Ion engines that make them make more noise and have a beeping noise on activation.

Thanks for the help in advance.
